tool_description: The image cropping capability can transform the input image according to the specified size. Support to automatically determine the position of the subject area, and use a better cropping method to crop the image.
name: Image cropping
title: Image cropping

api_list.name: Image cropping

required_parameters.name: image
required_parameters.description:
- **Image format**: `JPEG` `JPG` `PNG` `BMP` `WEBP`
- **Image size**: No more than 3.5 MB.
- **Image resolution**: Less than 2000x2000px.
- The images must all be RGB 3-channel.
